abstract: The Web site ifixit took apart Apple’s Magic Trackpad showing a detailed view of what is under the hood of this new mouse replacement.
snippet: The Web site ifixit took apart Apple’s Magic Trackpad showing a detailed view of what is under the hood of this new mouse replacement.
lead_paragraph: The Web site iFixit posted a detailed look at the guts of Apple’s new Magic Trackpad.

headline.main: Bits Pics: Looking Inside Apple’s New Trackpad
